column1: Trump might as well appoint Curly, Larry and Moe over the coronavirus. And, Trump might as well be Donald Duck. Stephen's wife, Drunken Kudlow, Daydreaming Pence, Pitiful Mulvaney and Disinformation Fox News, we might as well listen to Dr. Bornstein.
Oooooh shit. Trump and Trumpess in charge on coronavirus. Dammit.
